metadata.description: Dark Horse Comics is proud to present a series of digital sampler comics, Builds Characters. Each sampler will focus on a single creator and excerpt variety of their past and upcoming works with Dark Horse. Enjoy this free sampling from Harvey Award“winning writer and artist Matt Kindt, featuring a choice selection of the hotly anticipated Past Aways , as well as excerpts from modern classics MIND MGMT , The Complete Pistolwhip , and 3 Story !
metadata.name: Dark Horse Builds Characters
